titleStmt.title: Unto the right honourable, the Lords of his Majesty's Privy Council. The petition of the Earl of Seafort.
titleStmt.author: Seaforth, Kenneth Mackenzie, Earl of, d. 1701.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Creased, print show through with loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
